headline: Simon Property Group: Appears Fairly Valued, But Dividend Growth Could Ignite The Next Rally (Rating Downgrade)
summary: The acquisition of the remaining Taubman Realty Group stake and $1.25B in new projects position Simon Property Group for long-term growth. Read why SPG is a Hold.
